wikipedia_page.main: Michael John Ellis (born 3 September 1936 in London, Greater London) was an Olympic athlete from England.

link_mentions.page: Great Britain at the 1960 Summer Olympics

response: Michael or Mike Ellis may refer to:
*Mike Ellis (South African politician) (born 1946), deputy chief whip of South Africa's major opposition party
* Mike Ellis (athlete), hammer thrower who competed in the Rome 1960 Summer Olympics, and won gold for England at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff
